memberdef.name: SONICATOR_DEFAULT_STATE
memberdef.initializer: = { .state = SONICATOR_STATE_UNKNOWN, .previous_state = SONICATOR_STATE_UNKNOWN, .state_entry_time = 0, .amplitude_percent = SONICATOR_MIN_AMPLITUDE_PERCENT, .start_requested = false, .stop_requested = false, .reset_requested = false, .is_running = false, .overload_active = false, .frequency_locked = false, .power_watts = 0.0f, .frequency_hz = 0, .active_faults = SONICATOR_FAULT_NONE, .fault_count = 0, .last_fault_time = 0, .last_update_time = 0, .watchdog_last_reset = 0, .safety_override = false, .start_count = 0, .total_runtime_ms = 0, .last_start_time = 0 }

detaileddescription.para:
Cannasol Technologies
2025-09-16
2.0.0
Implementation of the generic SonicatorInterface class. This version is configured via a pin structure, allowing it to manage any of the four sonicator channels.
